location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'GENERAL MAP OF BAHRAIN ISLAND PERSIAN GULF.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paper.Dimensions: 1090 x 410mm, on sheet 1150 x 450mm.

mods.abstract: Map dated 1 June 1938, and revised 28 December 1938, produced by the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO).Shows settlements, BAPCO installations, company reservations, locations of oil wells, hydrology, vegetation, cultivation, utilities, and some indication of relief, explained in key provided in the lower left portion of the map.Revisions listed, 1938.
